html:
9.25.20  10:31 am   how to do something impossible?

      you could start by making up a song about it

9.25.20  10:15 am   should i learn to notate music on paper or is recording myself good enough? in your opinion are there any advantages/disadvantages of one over the other?

      the advantage to notation would be: if you need someone else to be able to play something without having any time to prepare or memorize. CAUTION: this only works on people who can read well enough to do this. which is fewer and fewer people, as recording devices become more and more readily available. Advantage of notation, is that you can read while you are playing, where as you can't really play something from a recording in real-time. Advantages to recording, you can record the music much more accurately, and express things that would be impossible to fully explain in notation

9.25.20  10:00 am   why is everything so bad and terrible?

      to inspire you to find better ways

9.25.20  9:56 am   what's your opinion on letters

      they're pretty good

9.25.20  9:39 am   Have you really been down 124th street 

      i don't recall

9.25.20  9:35 am   is music bad

      yes, and good

9.25.20  9:05 am   Preferred alternatives to good morning?

      hi

9.25.20  9:04 am   Are you proud of your new song?

      yes

     sure, yes

      or is that too much?

     it is just the right amount

9.25.20  8:53 am   can you summon potatoes

      the damn things summon themselves

9.25.20  8:49 am   Do you warn us about the future with your songs like Mt. Saint Helens etc.

     no

     Or do you just shsksbdjfbfbrbnfkfi

9.25.20  8:47 am   Are you god?

      i thought you were

9.25.20  8:23 am   should i invent an inversion inverter so that if something is inverted accidentally i can invert the inversion so that its uninverted?

      yes that seems useful

9.25.20  7:29 am   How did you learn music?

     i'm not sure

     Do you have any good resources for learning it? 

     a lot of songs

9.25.20  7:02 am   What kind of writings do you prefer?

      i prefer when the writings are allowed to change between different kinds

9.25.20  4:15 am   will you ever return to that "bed, bath and beyond" you were in?

      which one

9.25.20  2:44 am   How do you learn a language without already knowing a language?

      start with feelings. feelings make sounds. sounds make language

9.25.20  1:53 am   How have you been lately?  

     ok

     Drink any tea?

     no

9.25.20  1:47 am   Why isn't it more common people seek a better understanding of an opposing view?

      i thought that was very common

9.25.20  1:19 am   thoughts on british humour

      even more funny if it's outside britain, because in britain is where you would expect it to be

9.25.20  1:08 am   can you put apples in a video?

      can confirm

9.25.20  12:26 am   how do you deal with the barrage of "when's the next video coming out" questions

      sometimes i do not answer. sometimes i answer the exact same way i have answered before. sometimes i answer in a way i have never answered before. these are 3 of my main strategies

9.24.20  11:46 pm   Did you write music as a kid?

      yes but i didn't really find any good ways to readily incorporate it with lyrical language until later, at least not in any ways that felt plausible/sensible enough to really get behind

9.24.20  11:39 pm   do you like music

      it's ok

9.24.20  11:34 pm   can i love your music any more than i already do

      we'll see

9.24.20  10:11 pm   In the song "at the airport terminal" when you say "and I think I'm dying but I'm just being born" why did you put a picture of a baby bird/chick?

      because that relates to 'being born'. if it was a baby that means it was most likely born recently. also, now that i think about it, birds are a flying animal, so that makes it a pretty good choice for a song about airplanes which is also a flying thing. at least they used to be, when i wrote the song

9.24.20  9:55 pm   Would you say that philosophy is mere opinion, or is there right and wrong in certain statements?

      i would argue, not so much 'mere', but rather, 'MIRROR'

9.24.20  9:36 pm   Should I perceive everything you say as fact and blindly follow whatever you say?

      no

9.24.20  9:09 pm   where do you get inspiration for your music?

      in the earth's atmostphere, and lithosphere

9.24.20  8:58 pm   have any of your dreams inspired some leads or riffs in your music?

      yes

9.24.20  8:30 pm   How far can you throw a frisbee?

      hopefully far enough to reach the next frisbee

9.24.20  7:15 pm   what is something that really inspires you?

      graphical perspective

9.24.20  7:06 pm   will you ever make that episode about velcro?

      i will wait until the controversy around velcro settles down

9.24.20  6:50 pm   HELP MY CAPS LOCK BROKE

      i want to believe you

9.24.20  6:17 pm   hey bill is this really you?

     is who really me

     also, how does one go about animating i want to get started on it.

      ah, you must complete the 12,999 levels of suffering, then the 13,000th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there's another 1000 levels after that

9.24.20  5:58 pm   What was your first instrument that you played

     it's hard to remember

     and have you had a teacher that is not yourself?

      barely

9.24.20  5:18 pm   Hey bro, I can get not-bad melodies, but my harmonic sense is still lowkey crap. I only got to make something good sounding with the Andalusian cadence (with a few invs), but either I got something embarrassingly sounding, or I ditch the harmony entirely, and I can work it out fine that way...
Got any tips?

      check out some songs

9.24.20  4:45 pm   why dont you like being chastised

      it's just distracting, that's all

9.24.20  4:19 pm   At what point did you think to yourself "yeah, I've definitely got my own style now" and was it an intentional thing? Or did it just happen?

      think of it this way...... i can think of 9,999999999999999 styles that are impossible. and just maybe, ....... just when i think all hope is lost, sometimes i can figure out just 1 way that might barely be possible. it's like searching for water in the desert when you are dying of thirst. yes, searching for water is intentional, but you are scared it won't happen, and your life depends on it, and finding it is a miracle if it ever happens

9.24.20  4:02 pm   is it wierd that i always have a song in my head, like all the time?

      no

9.24.20  3:40 pm   Hey Bill, I'm studying to become a musician.  I'm really into music theory, and I still can't figure out what your secret is.  What chords are you using to get that very specific sound you have, and how do they relate to each other?

      hm...... it's funny you bring this up, because i was just beginning to wonder what words you are using to make such a majestic question

9.24.20  3:31 pm   how do i know if time is still working correctly

      check out some songs. if it's working correctly then you should feel 'good'

9.24.20  3:27 pm   Is my existence important?

      how did you know

9.24.20  2:45 pm   Why are you such an amazing person?

      by giving myself the same name as you, i may have convinced you to see your own good qualities in others.... at least i am hoping that is what happened

9.24.20  2:08 pm   how do i learn how to be talented?

      think about what you think talent should be. i should clarify: that advice is specifically tailored to you, because you've already been thinking. for someone who has not asked this question, my advice would be not to think about it, which i would not tell them, otherwise then they would think about it, and also because they didn't ask, which is because they didn't think about it. but for you, since you've already thought about it, the advice i have given you is meant for a thinking person such as yourself

9.24.20  1:59 pm   does wearing the hat sideways help squeeze out creative brain juice? would you recommend?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.24.20  1:49 pm   too lazy to look this up but what's your first ever jingle/song and when did you make it?

      too lazy to answer

9.24.20  1:36 pm   Do you have any words of encouragement for a struggling student?

      turn the tables ..... try teaching

9.24.20  1:35 pm   What is onion? 

      it's like a baseball you can eat

9.24.20  1:29 pm   hello, mr bill.

you are truly an inspiration and i hope your new song is going well!

what got you into this style of editing and songwriting?

     just trying to get by

     its so incredibly unique and i often wonder how you came up with it

      think of it this way.... if the goal is to make audio/visual content as 'good' as i 'want' it to be, .... i can think of 9,999999999 ways of doing it that are impossible. and 1 way that might be just barely possible
